Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
